revised_title: Investigating the Mysterious Failure of Haddocks on the Coasts of Northumberland, Durham, and Yorkshire
tldr: The author investigates the sudden and significant decline in haddock populations on the coasts of Northumberland, Durham, and Yorkshire. He explores various potential causes, including volcanic matter in the sea, changes in weather patterns, and the impact of other fish species. The author also reports on the experiences of fishermen and their struggles due to the loss of this important food source.
